name: nitch product
description: It is a single product niche website. Users can browse different models of Canon cameras and also can place an order.
A user needs to register using email and password or can log in using google mail.
A logged-in user will have access to a dashboard to manage orders, make a payment and write a review.
The review will display on the home page of the website.

An admin will have a protected dashboard to manage all products and orders. Can make a registered user an admin and also can add a new product. To check the admin dashboard pleas use admin@admin.com and password: 123456.

name: travel around
description: Simple online tour booking system. Users can book tour packages and also ask for custom packages. Users can log in using google mail and can cancel the booking.
An admin can approve or reject any booking made by users. Can add new packages.
The user will get a booking confirmation notification.
To book a package user needs to log in via a google mail account.
Firebase authentication implemented.
